attributes.title: PlayStation 5 Hopes, Dreams, and Rumors - Ep. 1
attributes.description: Blessing Adeoye Jr. and Greg Miller start Volume 2 of PS I Love You XOXO. What better way to begin than catching up on PS5 rumors, talking Trophies, and... well, podcasting for two hours about 104 PSN games, the PlayStation GOTY 2010, and more!

attributes.title: What PlayStation Skipping E3 2020 Means for PS5 - Ep. 2
attributes.description: Blessing and Greg wrestle with the breaking news of PlayStation bailing on E3 2020, rank their first PSN games of the year, and so much more!

attributes.title: PlayStation Fantasy Draft 2020 - Ep. 3
attributes.description: Blessing and Greg are joined by Illfonic's Gio Corsi, IGN Podcast Beyond's Jonathon Dornbush, and GameSpot After Dark's Kallie Plagge to draft the ultimate fantasy roster of PlayStation games.

attributes.title: Shuhei Yoshida: A Decade of Dreams? - Ep. 4
attributes.description: Shu thinks Dreams has a 10-year lifecycle, but what do Greg and Blessing think? Find out after Greg rants about Patapon 2 Remastered and Blessing Jr. rants about GTA V.

attributes.title: When in the World Is the PS5 Reveal Event? - Ep. 5
attributes.description: Bless and Greg debate when the PS5 will show it's beautiful face, if Remote Play on Switch matters, and so much more!

attributes.title: PS5: What If It's the Last PlayStation? - Ep. 6
attributes.description: Blessing and Greg talk about the price of the PS5, what would make PlayStation get out of the console business, and explore why there's no marketing for Dreams.

attributes.title: Dreams PS4 Review - Ep. 7
attributes.description: Blessing and Greg have had a week with Dreams, and what a week it's been.

attributes.title: How PS5 Answers Xbox Series X - Ep. 8
attributes.description: Phil Spencer just dropped a bunch of Xbox Series X info on the world -- so what does it mean for Sony's PlayStation 5?

attributes.title: The Last of Us Part II 's Burning Questions Answered - Ep. 9
attributes.description: Blessing and Greg tackle the best reader mail question ever and predict The Last of Us Part II's plot, characters, and more!

attributes.title: PlayStation's Next First Party Move - Ep. 13
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing debate if Sony needs another first party studio, what's going on with PlayStation upper-management, and if Uncharted 4's final boss fight is good!

attributes.title: PS5 DualSense: Ranking the Features - Ep. 15
attributes.description: Blessing and Greg decide what matters most when talking about the DualSense, PS5's controller.

attributes.title: PS5's Ever-Changing Reveal Plan - Ep. 16
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing talk about the revelations from Bloomberg's PS5 story, what it means for us finally seeing this console, and more!

attributes.title: Predator: Hunting Grounds Review - Ep. 17
attributes.description: Nick and Andy join Greg and Blessing to talk about their weekend as the Predator. Plus, we cover why people are spoiling The Last of Us Part 2.

attributes.title: How Naughty Dog Got Hacked - Ep. 18
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing go over Kotaku's reporting on The Last of Us Part II leak, talk about PlayStation Plus' game lineup, and more!

attributes.title: Is PS5 Already Falling Behind? - Ep. 19
attributes.description: Greg and Bless delve into a PlayStation Lifestyle editorial and talk about PS5's rollout compared to Xbox Series X's.

attributes.title: Does PlayStation Studios Take Enough Risks?
attributes.description: It's not a typo, PlayStation Studios is the new umbrella for first-party games. But after watching the Ghost of Tsushima blowout, Bless wants to know if PlayStation Studios is taking enough risks.

attributes.title: Is PlayStation Anti-Consumer?
attributes.description: Spider-Man's exclusive to Avengers on PlayStation?! You can't use DualShock 4's on PS5?! Greg and Blessing tackle the question of whether or not PlayStation is anti-consumer.

attributes.title: The Last of Us Part II: Your Reviews, Commentary
attributes.description: IGN's Janet Garcia joins Greg and Blessing to talk about The Last of Us Part II in a SPOILER-FILLED discussion led by you!

attributes.title: Will Last of Us Part II Harassment Kill Creativity?
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing talk about the possible impact of people harassing Naughty Dog, PlayStation getting serious about indies, and review Iron Man VR.

attributes.title: PS5 Revealed
attributes.description: IT HAPPENED: the PlayStation 5 is real. Join Greg, Blessing, Andy, and Tim for a live recap and freakout.

attributes.title: Is The Last of Us Part 2 PS4’s Biggest Success?
attributes.description: What the hell is Bugsnax? Greg and Bless try to figure it out, and they also talk about TLOU2's legacy, Ready at Dawn going to Facebook, and more.

attributes.title: Your Ghost of Tsushima Questions Answered
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing tackle your questions about Sucker Punch's latest game in a spoiler-free conversation... well, Greg spoils some Horizon: Zero Dawn stuff, but it's been three years. #GameProvidedByPlayStation

attributes.title: The Best PS4 Exclusive of All Time DECIDED
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing hold a 72-game tournament to decide the best PlayStation 4 exclusive to ever come to the console. HUGE shout-out to http://www.twitter.com/SDinfected for doing all the work and making our bracket!

attributes.title: What's PlayStation 4's Best New Franchise?
attributes.description: With everyone mad at Blessing and Greg about last week's tournament, the pair decides to just keep pissing people off this week and decide the best new IP on PS4.

attributes.title: Our Favorite PS4 Moments Ep. 21
attributes.description:
Greg and Blessing take Branddnh's question way too seriously and talk about the moments that defined the PS4 generation. 
Follow Janet: https://twitter.com/Gameonysus

attributes.title: What Makes "The Best" PlayStation Generation? - Ep. 34
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing talk about all the different arguments for what makes a PlayStation generation standout as we approach the PS5. Plus, game impressions, Dualsense examples, and more!

attributes.title: Should Sony Delay the PS5? - Ep. 35
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing tackle the argument that Sony should delay the PlayStation 5, talk about more PlayStation games coming to PC, and more!

attributes.title: GIVE US THE PS5 PRICE, SONY! - PS I Love You XOXO Ep. 36
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing talk about the PS5 release in a post-Xbox Series X reveal world.

attributes.title: Our PlayStation Piles of Shame
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing confess the PlayStation games they've never beaten but totally should've by now.

attributes.title: PS5 Showcase Recap - Ep. 37
attributes.description: Greg, Blessing, Tim, and Andy react to the PS5 event, break the news, and argue about all thinks PlayStation 5!

attributes.title: Shadow of the Colossus Review
attributes.description: After 15 years of never making it beyond the first colossi, Greg has beaten Team Ico's classic. Now, he and Blessing discuss.

attributes.title: The State of the PS5 - Ep. 38
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing recap a crazy week in PlayStation, debate what the Bethesda purchase means, and argue about Halloween colors!

attributes.title: PS5 Launch Line-Up Metacritic Predictions - Ep. 39
attributes.description: Greg and Bless run through the PlayStation 5 launch line-up and make their review score guesses. Plus, they argue about how confusing PS5's Spider-Man plan is.

attributes.title: PS5: How Excited Are You? - Ep. 40
attributes.description: Tim Gettys joins Greg for an episode recapping the PS5 news of the week and talking about excitement levels nearly one month from release.

attributes.title: PS5: One Month Until Launch - Ep. 41
attributes.description: With one month to go, Blessing and Greg breakdown backward compatibility, PS camera BS, and more!

attributes.title: Building the Ultimate PS5 Library - Ep. 42
attributes.description: Greg Miller has been declared the King of Halloween by Spirit Halloween, but Blessing Adeoye has some tricks up his sleeve. Oh, and the PS5 is incredibly close, so let's build a loadout of games for Day 1!

attributes.title: Your Cyberpunk 2077 Questions Answered - Ep. 49
attributes.description: Blessing is a lucky son of a gun and has already beaten Cyberpunk 2077. Today, he answers your questions about the experience. Greg is also here.

attributes.title: The 2020 PS I Love You XOXO PlayStation Awards
attributes.description: Let's end the year by arguing about our favorite games!

attributes.title: How to Start Bloodborne Ep. 51
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing return to talk about Bless beating and Greg starting Bloodborne, your 2021 questions, and so much more!
